spec_data.Name: perl-Locale-Codes
spec_data.Description:
Locale-Codes is a distribution containing a set of modules. The modules
each deal with different types of codes which identify parts of the locale
including languages, countries, currency, etc.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 04 Sep 2017 05:24:37 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Distribution of modules to handle locale codes
